name: Wolf + Rabbit
description:
Content Warning: Dark themes, suggestive content. This game is meant to be played between consenting partners.

Wolf + Rabbit was produced during Feb Fatale 5:Transgression at Dames Making Games in 2017. It was showcased at DMG's Transgression Arcade in 2017 and at the Love & Sex Show: Play with Me, presented by The Squeaky Wheel and DMG in 2019.
